name: Donkey Kong Country 3: Tag Team Trouble
overview: Here is Donkey Kong Country 3: Tag Team Trouble a rom hack of Donkey Kong Country 3 - Dixie Kong’s Double Trouble. This was entirely made with SDK3 Editor. All the levels have been entirely modified, with new level design, enemies, objects and bonus placement ! Boss and map are the same as the original. This game’s overall difficulty is the same as the original. A big part of the interest of this hack resides in finding all bonuses and DK coins. The number of bonus levels in each level is the same as the original. Will you be able to reach 103 % ? Good luck, and enjoy !!!
